weight.label: Weight
weight.description: Weight sets the order in which tiers are displayed.

AUTOMATIC.label: Automatic
AUTOMATIC.description: We will automatically include or exclude tax based on the currency of the purchase. For USD and CAD, tax will be excluded from the price, so it will be added on top of the price. For all other currencies, tax will be included in the price.

INCLUSIVE.label: Inclusive
INCLUSIVE.description: Tax will be included in the purchase price - the price will include the tax amount.

EXCLUSIVE.label: Exclusive
EXCLUSIVE.description: Tax will not be included in the purchase price – tax will be added on top of the price.

cta.subtitle: Cultivate Connections, Stress-Free.
cta.title: Seize the Moment, Elevate Your Business.
cta.paragraph: Unleash the full potential of your creative enterprise. Engage and grow your audience with enticing public previews of your podcasts and videos. Welcome fans into your community at no initial cost, offering a taste of your unique content with the freedom to upgrade anytime. Embrace effortless growth, without the worry.

string.email: Please enter a valid email address.
string.max: This field can be at most ${'{max}'} characters.

confirm.title: Are you sure?
confirm.description: This action is irreversible, selected data will be deleted. There is no coming back.

hero.subtitle: Unbeatable Value, Exceptional Service
hero.paragraph: At Creathors, we believe in offering transparent and fair pricing. Our 9% (75¢ minimum) (*0% for direct donations) commission on all payments is among the most competitive in the industry. No hidden fees, no surprises—just straightforward pricing that supports your growth.
hero.detail: Want an even better deal? Reach out to us at

hero.subtitle: Complete creative control
hero.title: Everything you need to make money doing what you love
hero.paragraph: Empower your creativity on a platform that values your work. With low fees, customizable pages, and direct engagement tools, we make monetizing your passion simple and rewarding. Join a community where every creator has a voice, and start building your success story today.

1.subtitle: Step 1: Create Your Account
1.title: Begin Your Creator Journey
1.paragraph: Dive into an inclusive platform where creativity meets opportunity. With a competitive 0-9% fee, our platform is designed for creators of all types. Engage your audience with polls, Q&A sessions, and private messaging, all while enjoying a lucrative return on your hard work. Transform your passion into profit in a community that celebrates creativity.

2.subtitle: Step 2: Customize Your Space
2.title: Make Your Space Yours
2.paragraph: Stand out with a page that mirrors your unique creativity. Customize your logo and background, and offer diverse content through unlimited tiers. Connect deeply with your audience using interactive polls and Q&A sessions. Your space is more than a display of work; it's a community ready to grow with you.

3.subtitle: Step 3: Share Your Work
3.title: Connect & Grow
3.paragraph: Let your creativity flow and captivate your audience. Share images, text, and videos effortlessly, enriching each post with the chance to inspire and engage. Foster a vibrant community with direct communication through private messages. Leverage interactive features to tailor content to audience preferences, turning your passion into a thriving career.

creators.subtitle: Complete creative control
creators.title: Monetize Your Passion with Ease
creators.paragraph: At Creathors, we elevate your passion into profit without the clutter of ads. Our membership model fosters a vibrant community focused on high-quality content and genuine interactions. Enjoy the freedom to create and connect, offering exclusive content and perks that keep you inspired. Join us and keep the creativity flowing.
